verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Unto Thee O Lord
Do I lift up my soul
Unto Thee O Lord
Do I lift up my soul

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O my God I trust in Thee
Let me not be ashamed
Let not mine enemies
Triumph over me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Yea let none that wait
On Thee be ashamed
Yea let none that wait
On Thee be ashamed

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Show me Thy ways
Thy ways O Lord
Teach me Thy paths
Thy paths O Lord

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Remember not
The sins of my youth
Remember not
The sins of my youth
